title: What did Joe Biden do to Anita Hill? - Quora
tags: Politicians and Government Leaders of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: He did his job on oral examination as chair of the Clarence Thomas confirmation committee where the witness Anita Hill gave inconsistent testomony regarding the nominees character. While Hill proved herself a stalker of Thomas and a woman scorned by Thomas’s lack of intrest was still able to produce some sorority sisters to testify that at some erleor time Thomas did show a passing intrest in her. The most interesting part of the hearing was the lack of questions or apparent intrest of committee member Ted Kennedy the leading authority on philandering.

asked for evidence and in a he said she said he asked questions rather than run with McCarthyism guilt by accusation . Having been fair and attempting to use a hearing to determine facts will cause him problems in the current democratic party
